menu.Servers are currently at full capacity: Los servidores están llenos ahora mismo

menu.When you leave the raid you don’t get an: When you leave the raid you don’t get anything and also receive Left the Action exit status.
menu.UI/leave_game_confirmation_text: Are you sure you want to leave?
